before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8m0pt","text":"Filtration and preservation of the water samples through filters","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":64}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l2mm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uh3g","text":"This protocol can be performed from filters preserved in tubes prefilled or not with preservation buffer (e.g. MWA1). If the filter is not prefilled with buffer, it should be frozen immediately after water filtration and until DNA extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11g0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpjnd","text":"Note: If the filters are preserved with MWA1 buffer, the extraction can be performed directly, but for other preservation buffers such as Longmire and CTAB, the protocol proposed here will work, but upstream precipitation is recommended to increase the extraction efficiency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cnt7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc51u","text":"This description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1bfjk","text":"The objective of this protocol is the environmental DNA (eDNA) extraction from water samples filtered through 47 mm diameter filters. This protocol can be performed from filters preserved in tubes prefilled or not with preservation buffer.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":38,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":82}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"853k0","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lrj6","text":"DNA extraction is performed using a MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) and with the NucleoMagDNA/RNA Water Kit (Macherey Nagel). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":49},{"style":"bold","offset":108,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k9l5","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i8kv","text":"The procedure is based on reversible adsorption of nucleic acids to paramagnetic beads under appropriate buffer conditions. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnfb8","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ibnh","text":"The benefits of using the MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) are increased productivity and repeatability, as well as eliminating human error and the pain of repetitive work.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":48},{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":108}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8130i","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au243","text":"This protocol is used prior to molecular biology analysis (e.g. qPCR, metabarcoding, ddPCR) to specifically target both macro- and micro-organisms eDNA extracted from water samples.\n","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":35},{"style":"bold","offset":115,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qqb","text":"This protocol is optimised for rare eDNA and the suggested elution volumes are therefore low (between 50 and 65 ÂµL), but can be increased if targets are more abundant.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40},{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"22fqv","text":"The main steps of the protocol are:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12cpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m50v","text":"Material preparation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6og2f","text":"Plate preparation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9osgu","text":"Sample lysis","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ihqs","text":"Extraction with the MagnetaPure 32 System (Dutscher)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4l1i","text":"DNA elution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

g)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10ehb","text":"- MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) filter","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv629","text":"- 50 mL tubes: 4 to prepare aliquots and 3 for scissors decontamination","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"691dh","text":"- 5 mL tubes: 1 per 8 samples to prepare NucleoMag B-Beads and MWA2 mix","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5s16","text":"- 2 mL tubes: 1 per sample to transfer lysate + 2 to prepare aliquots","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br4ca","text":"- 1.5 mL tubes: 1 per sample to transfer eluted DNA","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fis83","text":"- 96-well plate with 2 mL deep-wells, U-Bottom (Macherey Nagel - 746032.DEEP): 1 per 16 samples","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jlek","text":"- Magnetic rod coverfor MagnetaPure 32 (Macherey Nagel â€“ 747032.TC): 1 per 8
